data.title: Welcome to Bianchi Funeral Service located in Washington, DC
data.meta_description: Providing funeral, memorial, personalization and aftercare to the Washington, DC area
data.text:
Welcome to the Bianchi Funeral Service

Not just a funeral home...

but a part of the community.

At the Bianchi Funeral Service, our mission is to help facilitate meaningful ways for families to celebrate the lives of their loved ones. We understand how difficult making these types of arrangements can be. Let us help you to remember the dearly departed in a dignified and affordable manner. Bianchi Funeral Service has provided the Washington, DC metro area with the very best in traditional funerals for 27 years. Please call Bianchi Funeral Service today and let us meet your funeral service needs.

National & International Shipping Cremation Services

Traditional Funeral

Available 24 Hours a Day

27 Years of Experience

Member of the NFDA and the NFD & MA

DC Funeral Directors Board

Licensed Funeral Director in MD, DC and VA

Please feel free to browse our pages to learn more about pre-planning a funeral and grief support, as well as the traditional funeral and cremation services that we have to offer. If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to contact us at anytime, we are available by phone or e-mail, or drop by the office in person. We are always here to help.

We understand that it is not always possible to attend a service or visitation in person, so we encourage you to use our beautifully designed interactive online tributes to pay your respects. Leave a condolence, share a memory, post a photo, light a candle and more!
